languages.text: "Ирлиэт, я дам твоим сородичам шанс объясниться".

traits.locale_text: "Ирлиэт, я дам твоим сородичам шанс объясниться. Только потому, что ты просишь".

languages.text: "Yrliet, I will permit your kin to explain themselves."
languages.original_text: "Ирлиэт, я дам твоим сородичам шанс объясниться".

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet, I will permit your kin to explain themselves. I am doing this only because you asked."
"Yrliet, I will permit your kin to explain themselves. I am doing this only because you asked."
"Yrliet, I will permit your kin to explain themselves. I am doing this only because you asked."
"Yrliet, I will permit your kin to explain themselves. I am doing this only because you asked."
"Yrliet, I will permit your kin to explain themselves."
"Yrliet, I will permit your kin to explain themselves."

languages.text: «Yrliet, permitiré que tus congéneres expliquen sus actos».
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, I will permit your kin to explain themselves."

traits.locale_text: «Yrliet, permitiré que tus congéneres expliquen sus actos. Lo hago únicamente porque tú me lo has pedido».

languages.text: “伊莉耶特，我允许你的族人解释这到底是怎么回事。”
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, I will permit your kin to explain themselves."

traits.locale_text: “伊莉耶特，我允许你的族人解释这到底是怎么回事。但我之所以这么做，仅仅是因为你的请求。”

languages.text: « Je vais permettre à vos semblables de s'expliquer, Yrliet. »
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, I will permit your kin to explain themselves."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais permettre à vos semblables de s'expliquer, Yrliet, mais seulement parce que vous me l'avez demandé. »

languages.text: 「ユリエット、君の血族に弁明を許そう」
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, I will permit your kin to explain themselves."

traits.locale_text: 「ユリエット、君の血族に弁明を許そう」

languages.text: "Yrliet, ich gestatte Euren Verwandten, sich zu erklären."
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, I will permit your kin to explain themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet, ich gestatte Euren Verwandten, sich zu erklären. Ich tue das nur, weil Ihr mich darum gebeten habt."

languages.original_text: "Yrliet, I will permit your kin to explain themselves."
